Html:
Hi, how can I use the " apud " key,

I need to use apud to use a reference from another reference that I dont have access. i.e. an indirect quotation. In english I believe you can change " apud " for " in ".

I am using the ABNT style.
I don't think the open xml specificiation provides something for indirect citation. Perhaps you could 'abuse' the book section type.
Try this: You can click with right button of the mouse on the citation e select the "edit field" option. Then, you can put in the end of the sentence:  \f "apud "
